content: I think I'll try to anchor my habits to existing routines and create an implementation intention to help me stay committed. I've been trying to listen to the audiobook during my daily commute, which has been working well for me so far. One challenge I'm facing is finding time to practice reading and increasing my reading speed, as I've been dedicating most of my free time to listening to audiobooks. Do you have any advice on how to balance my time between listening to audiobooks and reading e-books or physical books?
